channel.title: [PI][Acheron V2] aka [Anarchy v2][PI]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img12/5928/hzbq.png[/img][/center]
[center]v1 Release: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=642681.0 Credits [So Far] Me [Brian] - 60% Maxime - 35% Haden - 5%
Features - Dicing - Pm logs - Chat logs - Commands logs - Vote store - Curse prayer - Players shop - Donator island - All Tzhaar waves - Custom quest tab - Bank slots fixed - Vote4Cash system - Money pouch fixed - 317 Gameframe fixed - Multiple custom item - Custom ranks + crowns - Clan chat + Lootshare - Donator Credits system - Ingame item spawner GUI - Staff interface options - Created summoning system - Perfect skillcape emotes - All 25 skill work perfectly - Perfect combat + perfect PVP - Dungeoneering & Pk'ing skills - Skillcape shop with no more lag - Quest cape require all stats 99 - Christmas craker system opening - Loyalty titles system color fixed - Donator cape gives 1.5x more experiences - Fullscreen - Nex [With Stages] - Frost Dragons - More Skin Colors - Snow [Lol] - Halloween Event - SOF - Achievement System - Control Panel - Staff List - MoneyVault - Aurora's or how ever you spell it - More Bosses - Loyalty Shop & Rank - REMOVE GRAND EXCHNAGE BECAUSE I DIDNT LIKE IT *MORE WILL BE ADDED DURING DEVELOPMENT*
Ranks + Crowns 1- Moderator 2- Administrator 3- Co-Owner 4- Donator 5- Owner of Course 6- Global Helper
Minigames - Barrows - Duel arena - Tzhaar cave - Pest control - Warriors guild
Bosses - Godwars - Corporal beast - Dagannoth kings - Tormented demons - King black dragon - Nex - Kalphite Queen - Nomad - Penguin - Tormented Demon - Mad Mummy - Forgotten Warrior - ETC
-Media
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img820/1411/or0z.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img33/8347/ewv8.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img812/5083/yjyh.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img802/4986/tumv.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img196/7594/itux.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img854/2521/fx49.png[/img]
[/center]
If anyone would like to contribute to this please comment , or message me ! or maxime ! :D[/center][/center]

item.title: [PI][Acheron V2] aka [Anarchy v2][PI]

item.description:
@ProjectRezurrection wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]v1 Release: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=642681.0
Credits [So Far]
Me [Brian] - 60%
Maxime - 35%
Haden - 5%

Features

  • Dicing
  • Pm logs
  • Chat logs
  • Commands logs
  • Vote store
  • Curse prayer
  • Players shop
  • Donator island
  • All Tzhaar waves
  • Custom quest tab
  • Bank slots fixed
  • Vote4Cash system
  • Money pouch fixed
  • 317 Gameframe fixed
  • Multiple custom item
  • Custom ranks + crowns
  • Clan chat + Lootshare
  • Donator Credits system
  • Ingame item spawner GUI
  • Staff interface options
  • Created summoning system
  • Perfect skillcape emotes
  • All 25 skill work perfectly
  • Perfect combat + perfect PVP
  • Dungeoneering & Pk’ing skills
  • Skillcape shop with no more lag
  • Quest cape require all stats 99
  • Christmas craker system opening
  • Loyalty titles system color fixed
  • Donator cape gives 1.5x more experiences
  • Fullscreen
  • Nex [With Stages]
  • Frost Dragons
  • More Skin Colors
  • Snow [Lol]
  • Halloween Event
  • SOF
  • Achievement System
  • Control Panel
  • Staff List
  • MoneyVault
  • Aurora’s or how ever you spell it
  • More Bosses
  • Loyalty Shop & Rank
  • REMOVE GRAND EXCHNAGE BECAUSE I DIDNT LIKE IT
    MORE WILL BE ADDED DURING DEVELOPMENT

Ranks + Crowns
1- Moderator
2- Administrator
3- Co-Owner
4- Donator
5- Owner of Course
6- Global Helper

Minigames

  • Barrows
  • Duel arena
  • Tzhaar cave
  • Pest control

[/center]

If anyone would like to contribute to this please comment , or message me ! or maxime ! :D[/center][/center]
